articles.title: British passenger in seat 11A survives India plane crash - BBC
articles.description: Vishwashkumar Ramesh is believed to have survived the Air India crash that killed at least 200 people.
articles.content:
André Rhoden-Paul
Vishwashkumar Ramesh meets Indian interior minister Amit Shah in hospital
A British man has walked away from the wreckage of the Air India crash that killed 241 people in an extra… [+4277 chars]
